mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HR.TBL_WALK (NUM, USER_ID, TITLE, LOCATION, "DATE", WALK_TIME, WALK_HOUR, WALK_MINUTE, CONTENT, REG_DATE, THUMB, AGE, BREED) VALUES( SEQ_WALK.NEXTVAL, #{user_id}, #{title}, #{location}, #{date}, #{walk_time}, #{walk_hour}, #{walk_minute}, #{content}, SYSDATE, #{thumb}, #{age}, #{breed})
mapper.select: SELECT NUM, USER_ID, TITLE, LOCATION, "DATE", WALK_TIME, WALK_HOUR, WALK_MINUTE, CONTENT, REG_DATE, THUMB, AGE, BREED FROM (SELECT * FROM TBL_WALK WHERE NUM > 0 ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 20

SELECT NUM, USER_ID, TITLE, LOCATION, "DATE", WALK_TIME, WALK_HOUR, WALK_MINUTE, CONTENT, REG_DATE, THUMB, AGE, BREED FROM (SELECT * FROM TBL_WALK WHERE NUM > 0 ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 20 AND USER_ID = #{user_id}

SELECT W.NUM, W.USER_ID, TITLE, LOCATION, "DATE", WALK_TIME, WALK_HOUR, WALK_MINUTE, CONTENT, REG_DATE, THUMB, AGE, BREED FROM (SELECT * FROM TBL_WALK WHERE NUM > 0 ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC) W JOIN TBL_WALK_LIKE L ON W.NUM = L.BOARD_NUM WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 20 AND L.USER_ID = #{user_id} AND L.LIKECHECK = 1
SELECT NUM, USER_ID, TITLE, LOCATION, "DATE", WALK_TIME, WALK_HOUR, WALK_MINUTE, CONTENT, REG_DATE, THUMB, AGE, BREED FROM TBL_WALK WHERE NUM <= #{num} AND NUM > #{num}-20 ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC

SELECT NUM, USER_ID, TITLE, LOCATION, "DATE", WALK_TIME, WALK_HOUR, WALK_MINUTE, CONTENT, REG_DATE, THUMB, AGE, BREED FROM TBL_WALK WHERE NUM <= #{num} AND NUM > #{num}-20 AND USER_ID = #{user_id} ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC

SELECT NUM, USER_ID, TITLE, LOCATION, "DATE", WALK_TIME, WALK_HOUR, WALK_MINUTE, CONTENT, REG_DATE, THUMB, AGE, BREED FROM TBL_WALK W JOIN TBL_WALK_LIKE L ON W.NUM = L.BOARD_NUM WHERE NUM <= #{num} AND NUM > #{num}-20 AND L.USER_ID = #{user_id} AND L.LIKECHECK = 1 ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC
SELECT NUM, USER_ID, TITLE, LOCATION, "DATE", WALK_TIME, WALK_HOUR, WALK_MINUTE, CONTENT, REG_DATE, THUMB, AGE, BREED FROM TBL_WALK WHERE NUM = #{num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_WALK_LIKE ( NUM, BOARD_NUM, USER_ID, LIKECHECK ) VALUES( SEQ_WALKLIKE.NEXTVAL, #{board_num}, #{user_id}, 1 )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_WALK_LIKE WHERE BOARD_NUM = #{board_num} AND USER_ID = #{user_id}
SELECT LIKECHECK FROM TBL_WALK_LIKE WHERE BOARD_NUM = #{board_num} AND USER_ID = #{user_id}
